text: Instead of using the author bio for a meta description on the `/author/` pages, we should probably have an additional field specifically for this on the author profile. Its understandable on why this would be used by default, but at the same time I think this limits our ability to create some really awesome author pages.

We have a client who has a crap ton of forms, we recently had to edit every form to add a qualifying question to them 32 forms in all. It would have been nice to be able to bulk edit a form similar to the way that bulk edit works in wordpress pages and posts. Select multiple forms and add field to all forms.
